name: Daymare Town Complete Collection
description:
ALL Daymare Town games in one package, retouched in HD.

That's 8 games all together.

That's not all - you also get soundtracks from Daymare Town 3 and 4.

The pack includes following:

  1. Daymare Town 1
  2. Daymare Town 2
  3. Daymare Town 3
  4. Daymare Town 4
  5. Daymare Cat
  6. Where is 2010?
  7. Daymare Invaders
  8. Daymare Kite
